<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Storm Chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1164)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This traveler's chair uses magic and Stasian technology, storing up power in its Stasian coils to arc lightning through your foes and grant brief spurts of flight.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)); **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You create a ball of electricity around the chair, surrounding it in a damaging aura of electricity and using electromagnetism to briefly levitate. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack, take 2d6 electricity damage each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)); **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You release the majority of the stored up energy from your _storm chair_, devastating foes in a chain of electricity. This has the effects of [_chain lightning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) with a DC of 31.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
